column2: Untouchable People - What's really going on in South Suburban Illinois?
column5: MY LIFE IS NOT A GAME…. DENIED MY RIGHTS….WHEN MY VOICE IS MY RIGHT!  BUT I WAS DENIED THAT RIGHT…..  HELP to “STOP BACK DOOR COURT” in Cook County Court Markham Illinois  Speaking Up for Voices Not Heard and Sights Not Seen! …..Still fighting for my Liberty of Life to not be violated! A Black Woman’s Fight for Survival of the “Secrets of the South Suburban Illinois”         FINANCIALLY STRIPPED and HOUSE JACKED through the court system (yes house clothes all stripped as though I didn’t exist and I didn’t matter) How a divorce took place without my knowledge…..Denied My Rights – My LIFE IS NOT A GAME! How a bank processed a business loan using my paid off home as collateral without my knowledge…. Denied My Rights – My LIFE IS NOT A GAME! How that same business loan was defaulted and my paid off home went into foreclosure without my knowledge…. Denied My Rights – My LIFE IS NOT A GAME! How I was denied my rights to not have my life threatened due to government employees not doing their jobs…… Denied My Rights – My LIFE IS NOT A GAME! How I was denied my right to work in an environment free of manipulation bullying harassment and sabotaging and told me to just deal with it….. Denied My Rights – My LIFE IS NOT A GAME! How business owners receive Medicaid / Link benefits years for completing home improvements on a State Employee’s personal home…… Denied My Rights – My LIFE IS NOT A GAME! SADLY….several state and county governmental departments that I contacted that are supposed to put out this FIRE are the part of keeping the FIRE IGNITED….as they continue to violate my rights to living without being violated….  Denied My Rights – My LIFE IS NOT A GAME! SADLY….government officials that were contacted either had no response or “Sorry this happened to you” MY LIFE IS NOT A GAME! HELP ME TO BRING AWARENESS AND PROTECT OTHERS FROM “THIS GAME” OF HAVING THEIR LIFE LITERALLY STRIPPED FROM THEM AND STOPPING “FAVORS FOR FRIENDS GOVERNMENT”  Corrupted people being protected by connection
